question: Among Phosphorus, Sulphur, Potassium, Calcium, Magnesium, Iron, Manganese, Copper, Molybdenum , Zinc & Boron , bring out those which are macronutrients?
option2: Phosphorus, Sulphur, Potassium, Calcium, Magnesium, Iron
option3: Phosphorus, Sulphur, Potassium, Calcium, Magnesium, Iron, Manganese, Copper,
answer: Phosphorus, Sulphur, Potassium, Calcium, Magnesium, Iron
